definition: bourgeois rightist faction (esp. during anti-rightist movement of 1957-58)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 you4 pai4

definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 ge2 ming4

sentences.english: Illustrated under the direction of Robert Kretschmer (1818–1872), they met with wide approval from the educated bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 它们获得了资产阶级教育界的广泛认可。

sentences.english: But the epoch of the bourgeoisie simplified the class antagonisms.
sentences.chinese: 但是，资产阶级时代的新时代却使阶级对立简单化了。

sentences.english: This is a manifestation of petty-bourgeois individualism.
From these burgesses the first elements of the bourgeoisie were developed.
sentences.chinese: 从这个市民等级中发展出最初的资产阶级分子。

sentences.english: It was necessary for us to combat bourgeois Rightists, but we went too far.
sentences.chinese: 反对资产阶级右派是必要的，但是搞过分了。

sentences.english: That was the way bourgeois society valued a man.
sentences.chinese: 这就是资产阶级社会评价人的方法。

sentences.english: We shall not allow a new bourgeoisie to come into being.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能允许产生一个新的资产阶级。

sentences.english: The bourgeois talked peaceably to the working-classes of what was in preparation.
sentences.chinese: 资产阶级泰然自若地和工人们谈论着正在准备中的事。

sentences.english: Revisionism is one form of bourgeois ideology.
sentences.chinese: 修正主义是一种资产阶级思想。

sentences.english: The mediaeval burgesses and the small peasant proprietors were the precursors of the modern bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 中世纪的城关市民和小农等级是现代资产阶级的前身。

sentences.english: The South Seas charmed him no more than did bourgeois civilization.
sentences.chinese: 南海并不比资产阶级文明更能吸引他。

sentences.english: Within the big bourgeoisie, the group favouring resistance is now different from the group that has already capitulated .
sentences.chinese: 目前的大资产阶级抗日派，是和降日派有区别的。

sentences.english: This fully reflects the revolutionary bourgeoisie with the compromise.
sentences.chinese: 这充分体现了资产阶级的革命性与妥协性。

sentences.english: The bourgeoisie is simply the contented portion of the people.
sentences.chinese: 资产阶级只不过是人民中得到满足的那一部分人。

sentences.english: Everyone for himself and the devil take the hindmost—this is the bourgeois point of view on life.
sentences.chinese: “人不为己，天诛地灭”，这是资产阶级的人生观。

sentences.english: The first part is about the formation of Chen Duxiu's democratic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章是陈独秀的资产阶级民主思想。

definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 ge2 ming4
